nodes.bodyText: if isEmployee is true we have to hide the field regardless of other booleans.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -6,7 +6,7 @@
 	<form name="incl-invoice-payment-partner-form" title="Partner" model="com.axelor.apps.base.db.Partner" onLoad="action-partner-attrs-show-specific-tax-note">
 	    <panel name="mainPanel" colSpan="12">
 	    	<field name="invoiceSendingFormatSelect" hideIf="isEmployee"/>
-	        <field name="invoicesCopySelect" hideIf="!isCustomer || isEmployee"/>
+	        <field name="invoicesCopySelect" hideIf="(!isCustomer || isEmployee) && !isSupplier"/>
